Package server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    a class representing the server for the server-client-intermediate host system. has Capability to receive requests, and create threads to process and send appropriate responses
    Author:
    Luke Newton, Kevin Sun, Joe Frederick Samuel, Ryan Ribeiro
